name: @nicolasflamel/secp256k1-zkp-native
description: Node.js addon for parts of libsecp256k1-zkp

scripts.preinstall: wget -O "./secp256k1-zkp.zip" "https://github.com/NicolasFlamel1/secp256k1-zkp/archive/master.zip" && unzip "./secp256k1-zkp.zip" && wget -O "./secp256k1-zkp-wrapper.zip" "https://github.com/NicolasFlamel1/Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper/archive/refs/heads/master.zip" && unzip "./secp256k1-zkp-wrapper.zip" && sed -i 's/^\([^\t\n].* [a-zA-Z0-9]*(\)\(.*)\)\(;\| {\)/\1InstanceData *instanceData, \2\3/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper-master/main.cpp" && sed -i 's/, )/)/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper-master/main.cpp" && sed -i 's/\(context\|scratchSpace\|generators\),/instanceData->\1,/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper-master/main.cpp" && sed -i 's/\(isValidSecretKey(\|isZeroArray(\)\([^I]\)/\1instanceData, \2/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper-master/main.cpp"

author: Nicolas Flamel
